title: Constant disconnects and lag
body:
All day today I have had games where my game just disconnects.
I can see people moving about and their health dropping but they arent doing any actions.
Then the game comes up with the "Atempting to Reconnect" and sometimes it even freezes for a few seconds !
I am with Adam Internet in Adelaide and i am pretty sure its not my internet as I have tested it in my browser and everyone in the house is using it fine too.

I dont usually use these forums and I have even tried to look for solutions myself ut it is getting so frustrating now that it happens every single minute of the game !
